q_en: What are the top three products made in all orders in total?
gt:
Sure thing! Let's dive into the top three products made in all orders. Here's a neat table to showcase the details:

| Rank | Product ID | Total Quantity | Attributes     | Description |
|------|------------|----------------|----------------|-------------|
| 1    | 7          | 540            | Purple, M size | Skirt       |
| 2    | 15         | 345            | Pink, M size   | Skirt       |
| 3    | 27         | 260            | Yellow, S size | T-shirt     |

These are the top performers! ğŸ‰ If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ğŸ˜Š

steps.sql: SELECT op.product_id, SUM(op.number) as total_quantity FROM order_product op GROUP BY op.product_id ORDER BY total_quantity DESC LIMIT 3;
steps.description: Retrieve the total quantity of each product made in all orders

steps.sql: SELECT p.attributes, pt.description FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (7, 15, 27);
steps.description: Retrieve the product attributes and type description for the top three products
